attributes.action: Keep driving lessons and tests open as it’s under the education category
attributes.additional_details: The government/parliament should consider this as all the steps have been taken to make sure that it is done safe
attributes.background: As we are entering lockdown two I would like to put it forward to have driving lessons and driving tests carried on as this comes under the education Catagory

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
